Where does it fit in an organization's learning strategy?
What are the key considerations for identifying VR learning use cases?

items.title: Human Resources Management in Practice – For Beginners
items.headline: How to run / manage HR activities for beginners, intermediates and new HR managers
objectives_summary: Points to consider while managing human resources activities
Headcount controlling, recruitment and selection process
Managing Human Resources, with examples provided

Identify the meaning/definition and uses of Strategic Foresight.
Identify the meaning/definition and uses of Integrative Thinking.

how to gain exclusivity with the very best candidates
how to navigate the offer stage to ensure deals never fall through

How do you protect yourself, your employees, and your business?

items.headline: By using efficient recruitment skills, a recruiter can find the right person to do the right job.
objectives_summary: Explain What is Recruitment
Explain the Importance of Recruitment
List the Sources of External Recruitment

items.title: The Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA)
items.headline: Everything you need to know about FMLA
objectives_summary: This course will provide you with general information that will assist you in recognizing coverage eligibility requirements of employees, identify the responsibilities of employers, employee responsibilities and protections offered under the FMLA, eligibility for Airline Flight Crew employees, and Military members.

items.title: Human Resource Information System
items.headline: Effective using information systems to enhance employee performance and improve employees skills set
objectives_summary: Systems consideration in the design of human resources information system
Planning for systems implementation
Database concept and its application in human resources information system

objectives_summary: HIPAA and HITECH Fundamentals

items.title: Global Business: Cultural and Behavioral Norms Part II

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course offers country-culture specifics as they apply to working with and for people in several other countries.
objectives_summary: Discover some general tips that will make it easier to deal with those in other countries.
Explore beliefs and behaviors in several countries.
Recognize that there is not only “one right way” to behave or do business.

items.title: Employee Engagement by 4 world-class experts
items.headline: 6 Steps To Building Highly Engaged Employees
objectives_summary: You'll be armed with tips and tricks that have a proven track record in increasing engagement and driving growth for your business.
You'll learn an unique system "Group Activation System" for engagement

items.title: Connecting Globally When Leading Change

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses communicating your full vision of change.
objectives_summary: Identify the essential components of communicating the change
Discover how to use storytelling to weave those components into a message that resonates with any culture
Explore the concepts of International English to create messaging that is clearly understood by all

items.title: Prevention of Sexual Harassment at Workplace in India
items.headline: A course that creates awareness and is mandatory to follow in India
objectives_summary: The students will understand the implementation of the law against sexual harassment. They will understand the various forms of sexual harassment and process of filing a complaint. They will learn ways in which sexual harassment can be prevented. They will be aware of what actions to take if there is a case of sexual harassment at workplace.

items.title: Managing Employee Performance Issues In The Workplace
items.headline: A Practical Guide To Handling Employee Performance Issues For Managers and HR Professionals
objectives_summary: Explain the types of performance issues that occur in the workplace, and the internal and external reasons for poor performance.
Understand how to develop a process for handling employee performance issues.
Be able to discuss considerations for initiating layoffs or downsizing.
